018
019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.vmconlet;
020
021import java.time.Duration;
022import java.time.Instant;
023import java.util.Arrays;
024import java.util.LinkedList;
025import java.util.List;
026
027/**
028 * The Class TimeSeries.
029 */
030@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
031public class TimeSeries {
032
033    private final List<Entry> data = new LinkedList<>();
034    private final Duration period;
035
036    /**
037     * Instantiates a new time series.
038     *
039     * @param series the number of series
040     */
041    public TimeSeries(Duration period) {
042        this.period = period;
043    }
044
045    /**
046     * Adds data to the series.
047     *
048     * @param time the time
049     * @param numbers the numbers
050     * @return the time series
051     */
052    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition")
053    public TimeSeries add(Instant time, Number... numbers) {
054        var newEntry = new Entry(time, numbers);
055        boolean adjust = false;
056        if (data.size() >= 2) {
057            var lastEntry = data.get(data.size() - 1);
058            var lastButOneEntry = data.get(data.size() - 2);
059            adjust = lastEntry.valuesEqual(lastButOneEntry)
060                && lastEntry.valuesEqual(newEntry);
061        }
062        if (adjust) {
063            data.get(data.size() - 1).adjustTime(time);
064        } else {
065            data.add(new Entry(time, numbers));
066        }
067
068        // Purge
069        Instant limit = time.minus(period);
070        while (data.size() > 2
071            && data.get(0).getTime().isBefore(limit)
072            && data.get(1).getTime().isBefore(limit)) {
073            data.remove(0);
074        }
075        return this;
076    }
077
078    /**
079     * Returns the entries.
080     *
081     * @return the list
082     */
083    public List<Entry> entries() {
084        return data;
085    }
086
087    /**
088     * The Class Entry.
089     */
090    public static class Entry {
091        private Instant timestamp;
092        private final Number[] values;
093
094        /**
095         * Instantiates a new entry.
096         *
097         * @param time the time
098         * @param numbers the numbers
099         */
100        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ArrayIsStoredDirectly")
101        public Entry(Instant time, Number... numbers) {
102            timestamp = time;
103            values = numbers;
104        }
105
106        /**
107         * Changes the entry's time.
108         *
109         * @param time the time
110         */
111        public void adjustTime(Instant time) {
112            timestamp = time;
113        }
114
115        /**
116         * Returns the entry's time.
117         *
118         * @return the instant
119         */
120        public Instant getTime() {
121            return timestamp;
122        }
123
124        /**
125         * Returns the values.
126         *
127         * @return the number[]
128         */
129        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.MethodReturnsInternalArray")
130        public Number[] getValues() {
131            return values;
132        }
133
134        /**
135         * Returns `true` if both entries have the same values.
136         *
137         * @param other the other
138         * @return true, if successful
139         */
140        public boolean valuesEqual(Entry other) {
141            return Arrays.equals(values, other.values);
142        }
143    }
144}
